name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】LET THIS RAIN SHAMAN SHINE YOUR DAY!! REAL NO FAKE 100%!! EHEK! #KoboKanaeru3D [8xF1xccpc98]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Kobo and Mori Calliope dialogue. Kobo is crying about being cheated on.
Takanashi Kiara joins. Kobo fakes being dead after being shot by a water gun.
Family talk between the three. Kobo and Kiara decide to go out, excluding Calli.

scenes.song_name: Sil-ve-President (シル・ヴ・プレジデント)
